                                            "elementLabel": "Playbook Picker",
                                            "eventMappings": [],
                                            "isHidden": {
                                                "binding": {
                                                    "address": [
                                                        "playbook_custom_layout",
                                                        "compactMode"
                                                    ]
                                                },
                                                "type": "DATA_OUTPUT_BINDING"

                                            "preset": {
                                                "controllerElementId": "playbook_custom_layout",
                                                "disabledEventTargetIds": [],
                                                "id": "a41afa67e42b9d30cff2bc8170b6eb5c"
                                            },
                                            "propertyValues": {
                                                "configAria": {
                                                    "type": "JSON_LITERAL",
                                                    "value": null
                                                },
                                                "disabled": {
                                                    "type": "JSON_LITERAL",
                                                    "value": false
                                                },
                                                "hideLabel": {
                                                    "type": "JSON_LITERAL",
                                                    "value": false
                                                },
                                                "icon": {
                                                    "type": "JSON_LITERAL",
                                                    "value": null
                                                },
                                                "items": {
                                                    "script": {
                                                        "apiVersion": "2.0.0",
                                                        "controllerElementId": null,
                                                        "inlineScript": "/**\n * @param {params} params\n * @param {api} params.api\n * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers\n */\nfunction evaluateProperty({ api }) {\n\tconst playbooksByContextId = api.data.playbook_custom_layout.playbooksByContextId;\n\n\tif (!playbooksByContextId || !Object.keys(playbooksByContextId).length)\n\t\treturn;\n\n\tconst playbookItems = Object.values(playbooksByContextId).map(\n\t\t({ sysId, title }) => {\n\t\t\tif (!sysId || !title) return;\n\n\t\t\treturn {\n\t\t\t\tid: sysId,\n\t\t\t\tlabel: title\n\t\t\t};\n\t\t}\n\t);\n\n\treturn playbookItems;\n}\n",
                                                        "scriptSysId": "4e95b07e4300021000bb7ff8abb8f21e",
                                                        "target": null
                                                    },
                                                    "type": "CLIENT_TRANSFORM_SCRIPT"
                                                },
                                                "label": {
                                                    "type": "JSON_LITERAL",
                                                    "value": ""
                                                },
                                                "labelPosition": {
                                                    "type": "JSON_LITERAL",
                                                    "value": "top"
                                                },
                                                "labelSize": {
                                                    "type": "JSON_LITERAL",
                                                    "value": ""
                                                },
                                                "opened": {
                                                    "type": "JSON_LITERAL",
                                                    "value": false
                                                },
                                                "panelFitProps": {
                                                    "type": "JSON_LITERAL",
                                                    "value": {}
                                                },
                                                "search": {
                                                    "type": "JSON_LITERAL",
                                                    "value": "none"
                                                },
                                                "selectedItems": {
                                                    "container": [
                                                        {
                                                            "binding": {
                                                                "address": [
                                                                    "playbook_custom_layout",
                                                                    "selectedItem",
                                                                    "playbookContextId"
                                                                ]
                                                            },
                                                            "type": "DATA_OUTPUT_BINDING"
                                                        }
                                                    ],
                                                    "type": "LIST_CONTAINER"
                                                },
                                                "tooltipContent": {
                                                    "type": "JSON_LITERAL",
                                                    "value": null
                                                }
                                            },
                                            "slot": null,
                                            "styles": null
                                        },
                                        {

                                            "propertyValues": {
                                                "actionBar": {
                                                    "type": "JSON_LITERAL",
                                                    "value": false
                                                },
                                                "actionBarConfig": {
                                                    "type": "JSON_LITERAL",
                                                    "value": {
                                                        "leftIcon": "record-activity-details-fill",
                                                        "leftTooltip": "Display left pane only",
                                                        "middleIcon": "record-activity-stream-outline",
                                                        "middleTooltip": "Display both panes",
                                                        "rightIcon": "record-activity-outline",
                                                        "rightTooltip": "Display right pane only"
                                                    }
                                                },
                                                "bare": {
                                                    "type": "JSON_LITERAL",
                                                    "value": true
                                                },
                                                "bottomPaneAriaLabel": {
                                                    "type": "JSON_LITERAL",
                                                    "value": "Bottom pane"
                                                },
                                                "bottomPaneConstraints": {
                                                    "type": "JSON_LITERAL",
                                                    "value": "{\"minRatio\": 20, \"minPixels\": 100}"
                                                },
                                                "defaultDisplayedPane": {
                                                    "script": {
                                                        "apiVersion": "2.0.0",
                                                        "controllerElementId": null,
                                                        "inlineScript": "/**\n  * @param {params} params\n  * @param {api} params.api\n  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers\n  */\nfunction evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {\n\tif(!api.data.playbook_custom_layout.compactMode) return \"both\";\n\n  return (api.data.playbook_custom_layout.selectedItem || {}).stageContextId ? \"right\" : \"left\";\n}",
                                                        "scriptSysId": "548541364380021000bb7ff8abb8f247",
